data.name: Demon Path: Tower of Armagor
data.detailed_description:
A hard rogue-like game with strategy elements tells the story of a demon's uneasy path to an underground portal. The demon Armagor long ago left this planet, leaving the only one way to himself. He is eager to find a new warlord and hopes that someone will succeed in reaching the bottom of the underground tower by overcoming many challenges. So far, no one has ever succeeded.

  • 1000 Randomly generated floors. Start your journey from the surface and reach the deepest depths. Fight randomly generated monsters and bosses on your path.

  • Return to the surface after clearing every floor. Upgrade and build up your fortress. Fight off attacking waves. Summon creatures to help. Provide them with food and accommodation.

  • Build infrastructure, get heals and upgrades, pray to demons or just rest before you go to the next deadly floor.

  • Gather up to 12 demons into your group. Take up to 50 monsters from the fortress.

  • Organize a gang of 4 of your personal imps. They will help you in battles, as well as collect loot for you.

  • Death is final. Making a pair for offspring will help you continue on your journey. Take a pair with you into battle to improve you and weaken your enemies.

  • As you level up, pick up the right randomly generated talents, abilities and skills. Upgrade your equipment and aides. Upgrade core stats from 21 kinds. Every little thing can save your life even the cleanliness and sleepiness of your demon.

  • Make a unique demon by going through many creation steps choosing religion, soul type, body type, wings, tail, horns and more.

  • Watch on not only health and mana of your demon, but also 16 other stats and an additional 12 body condition parameters. Using the new RFBS 1.0 Lite system.

Good luck on this not easy path. Once you reach the bottom of the tower, this world will most likely be destroyed. According to the legends, the portal is only meant for one who enters it. Can that demon be yours? Face the Armagor and decide your fate.

data.short_description: The game focuses on the adventure of a demon who decides to leave the planet by finding a portal. Reach the bottom of the tower, overcoming 1,000 randomly generated levels. Build a base for defense and recovery. Maybe you will succeed...
